## Preliminaries
### Update everything

```bash
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install zsh curl git stow -y
chsh -s $(which zsh)
```
Reboot.

* [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/install-linux?_tk=install_view) + selective sync

## Dotfiles

```zsh
# remove some config files
mv ~/.zshrc ~/.zshrc.old
mv ~/.config/ghostty/config ~/.config/ghostty/config.old
# sync dotfiles
sudo apt install stow
cd ~/Dropbox/dotfiles
./install.sh
./fix_ssh_perms.sh
```

## R

### Latest release

```zsh
sudo curl -L https://rig.r-pkg.org/deb/rig.gpg -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/rig.gpg
sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://rig.r-pkg.org/deb rig main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rig.list'
sudo apt update
sudo apt install r-rig
```
Then
```zsh
rig add release
```

### Packages

Confirm R works and then in R confirm binaries are being downloaded from PPM:
```r
install.packages("usethis")
```
Then
```r
packages = c(
  "usethis",
  "devtools",
  "tidyverse",
  "targets",
  "tarchetypes",
  "arrow",
  "ipumsr",
  "fs",
  "crew",
  "openalexR"
)
r_univ_packages = c("epiextractr", "epidatatools", "realtalk")
gh_packages = c(
  "MilesMcBain/breakerofchains",
  "benzipperer/bzipr",
  # includes some additions to Miles McBain's tflow:
  "benzipperer/tflow"
)

install.packages(packages)
install.packages(r_univ_packages, repos = c("https://economic.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
remotes::install_github(gh_packages)

fs::dir_create("~/data/cps")
purrr::walk(c("basic", "org", "may"), ~ epiextractr::download_cps(.x, "~/data/cps"))
```

## Obsidian

### Install and sync

```zsh
sudo apt install libfuse2
```
Find path to Obsidian AppImage [here](https://obsidian.md/download), then

 ```zsh
 mkdir -p ~/obsidian
 mkdir -p ~/projects
 wget OBSIDIANURL -O ~/obsidian/Obsidian.AppImage
 chmod +x ~/obsidian/Obsidian.AppImage
 ~/obsidian/Obsidian.AppImage --no-sandbox
 ```

Set up sync to `~/projects/obsidian`.

### Desktop entry/URIs

Then setup URI handling and a desktop entry.
```zsh
sudo apt install vim
vim ~/.local/share/applications/obsidian.desktop
```
Use the entry:
```
[Desktop Entry]
Name=Obsidian
Comment=A powerful knowledge base that works on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files
Exec=/home/benzipperer/obsidian/Obsidian.AppImage --no-sandbox %u
Icon=/home/benzipperer/obsidian/icon.png
Terminal=false
Type=Application
Version=1.8.10
Categories=Office;Utility;
MimeType=x-scheme-handler/obsidian;text/html;
```
Download icon file:
```zsh
wget https://forum.obsidian.md/uploads/default/optimized/2X/6/6df43bc4ee96f0a1b67ff3600caf6879b758a743_2_500x500.png -O ~/obsidian/icon.png
```
Update database and confirm it works
```zsh
update-desktop-database ~/.local/share/applications/
xdg-open "obsidian://new?vault=notes&name=note&content=content"
```
 ([source](https://amirrachum.com/obsidian-uri-linux/))
